posts.post_title: FS - Johnson Portrait SC (649 op) PSA 4 (mc) - Reduction.  Great looking.
posts.post_content: For Sale - T206 Walter Johnson Sweet Cap 649 over print - PSA 4(mc).  This card is a beauty.  Now $3800 pp ff, includes shipping, please pm if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob Intrieri
